trans-unit.source: Brush & Pen user defined functions Reference

seg-source.mrk: Brush & Pen user defined functions Reference

target.mrk: Brush & Pen user defined functions Reference

trans-unit.source: Below is a complete list of the user defined functions available in AutoIt. Click on a user defined function name for a detailed description.

seg-source.mrk: Below is a complete list of the user defined functions available in AutoIt.
Click on a user defined function name for a detailed description.

target.mrk: Below is a complete list of the user defined functions available in AutoIt.
Click on a user defined function name for a detailed description.

trans-unit.source: When using them you need to add a #include .

seg-source.mrk: _WinAPI_CreateBrushIndirect

target.mrk: _WinAPI_CreateBrushIndirect

trans-unit.source: Creates a logical brush that has the specified style, color, and pattern

seg-source.mrk: Creates a logical brush that has the specified style, color, and pattern

target.mrk: Creates a logical brush that has the specified style, color, and pattern

seg-source.mrk: _WinAPI_ExtCreatePen

target.mrk: _WinAPI_ExtCreatePen

trans-unit.source: Creates a logical cosmetic or geometric pen that has the specified style, width, and brush attributes

seg-source.mrk: Creates a logical cosmetic or geometric pen that has the specified style, width, and brush attributes

target.mrk: Creates a logical cosmetic or geometric pen that has the specified style, width, and brush attributes

seg-source.mrk: _WinAPI_GetBrushOrg

target.mrk: _WinAPI_GetBrushOrg

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the current brush origin for the specified device context

seg-source.mrk: Retrieves the current brush origin for the specified device context

target.mrk: Retrieves the current brush origin for the specified device context

seg-source.mrk: _WinAPI_PatBlt

target.mrk: _WinAPI_PatBlt

trans-unit.source: Paints the specified rectangle using the brush that is currently selected into the specified device context

seg-source.mrk: Paints the specified rectangle using the brush that is currently selected into the specified device context

target.mrk: Paints the specified rectangle using the brush that is currently selected into the specified device context

seg-source.mrk: _WinAPI_SetBrushOrg

target.mrk: _WinAPI_SetBrushOrg

trans-unit.source: Sets the brush origin that GDI assigns to the next brush an application selects into the specified device context

seg-source.mrk: Sets the brush origin that GDI assigns to the next brush an application selects into the specified device context

target.mrk: Sets the brush origin that GDI assigns to the next brush an application selects into the specified device context

seg-source.mrk: _WinAPI_SetDCBrushColor

target.mrk: _WinAPI_SetDCBrushColor

trans-unit.source: Sets the current device context (DC) brush color to the specified color value

seg-source.mrk: Sets the current device context (DC) brush color to the specified color value

target.mrk: Sets the current device context (DC) brush color to the specified color value

seg-source.mrk: _WinAPI_SetDCPenColor

target.mrk: _WinAPI_SetDCPenColor

trans-unit.source: Sets the current device context (DC) pen color to the specified color value

seg-source.mrk: Sets the current device context (DC) pen color to the specified color value

target.mrk: Sets the current device context (DC) pen color to the specified color value
